# Readme generator


[![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MPL%202.0-blue.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/MPL-2.0)

## Description

CLI app to generate Readme files.

## Technology Stack

JavaScript,Node.js,Express.js
